thread.title: Ex-Spartan Mark Scarpinato key to Pittsburgh's defense
thread.title_full: Ex-Spartan Mark Scarpinato key to Pittsburgh's defense

title: Ex-Spartan Mark Scarpinato key to Pittsburgh's defense
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Yesterday 
Scarpinato serves as a backup DT and has been a key translator for Narduzzi's strategies to the Panthers' front seven. ...
